name: context-menu
desc: Allows the user to customize the context-menu, which is the drop-down menu that appears when users right click on a chart or when mobile device users tap the context-menu button.

attrs.name: button
attrs.desc: Sets the styling for the context-menu button that will appear when a chart is viewed on mobile devices.

attrs.name: custom-itemscustomItems
attrs.desc: Sets a collection of custom-menu items on the context menu.  Right click the chart in the demo and take notice of the "Run My JavaScript" button at the bottom of the context-menu.

attrs.name: empty
attrs.desc: Empties all default context-menu items, leaving just the "About ZingChart" button.

attrs.name: gear
attrs.desc: Sets the styling for the gear icon that appears by default in the context-menu button on mobile devices.

attrs.name: item
attrs.desc: Sets the styling for the context-menu items.

attrs.name: visible
attrs.desc: Setting this attribute to 0 or false will disable the context-menu.
